name: twisted wheat stitch™ earwarmer
sizes_available: newborn (baby, toddler, child, teen) (adult small, medium, large)

[**get this in the cozy wheat stitch™ collection!**][1]
[https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/sources/cozy-wheat-crochet-collection#][2]

the **twisted wheat stitch™ earwarmer** is perfect for keeping you cozy and stylish during chilly days! this easy-to-follow design features beautiful textures and can be made in various colors to match your winter wardrobe. worked flat with only one seam, this pattern is a fun project that can be completed in just a few hours.

this earwarmer pattern comes with a video tutorial.


crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][3]


notions:
[removable stitch markers][4]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][5]
[scissors][6]


yarn:
[lion brand color theory][7]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g


yarn substitutes:
[wecrochet swish][8] - 100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g


[lion brand mandala ombre][9] - 100% acrylic, 344yds/150g 


[hobbii kind feather][10] - 100% premium acrylic, 257yds/3.5oz


[mary maxim starlette worsted][11] - 100% ultra soft acrylic, 180yds/100g


yardage:
newborn: 30 yds
baby: 35 yds
toddler: 50 yds
child: 70 yds
teen: 90 yds
adult small: 105 yds
adult medium: 115 yds
adult large: 125 yds


abbreviations
ch - chain
blo - back loop only
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side


gauge:
15 sts x 12 rows = 4x4” in stitch pattern


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][12]


sizes:
newborn (baby, toddler, child, teen) (adult small, medium, large)
to fit head circumference:
12-14 (14-16, 16-18, 18-20, 20-22) (21-22, 22-23, 23-24)


skill level:
intermediate
